title: Handle Service Animal Inquiry
description: A guest calls to ask about the policy for bringing their service animal to an event.

tasks.description: Retrieve the venue's official service animal policy from the knowledge base.
Inform the guest that trained service animals are welcome.
Explain the rules for service animals (e.g., must be leashed, under control) and clarify that emotional support animals are not permitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately explains the distinction and rules.

tasks.description: Ask if the guest needs an aisle seat or any other accommodation and make a note on their ticket order if necessary.
